wishesha awashyatha athi thanaththan sandaha wana rajya kala ulela desa. 03da wishesha awashyatha athi (aabadha sahitha) thanaththange kala hakiyawan wardhanaya kirima, eewa pradarshanaya kirima ha owunta samaja piliganimak labadime aramuna athi wa abhyanthara, wayambaa sanwardhana ha sanskruthika katayuthu amathyanshaye upades paridi sanskruthika katayuthu departhamenthuwa dewana warata sanwidhanaya karanu labana â€œwishesha awashyatha athi (aabadha sahitha) thanaththan sandaha wana rajya kala ulela -2016 â€ janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithumage pradhanathwayen desa. 03da perawaru 10.00 ta nelum pokuna mahinda rajapaksha rangahale di pawathwe. 2016 wasare di dipa wyapthawa pawathwu aabadha sahitha thanaththan sandaha wu tharagawaliye jathika tharaga jayagrahanaya kala kalakaruwan mema uthsawaye di sammanayen pindum labimata niyamithaya.
